content.rendered:
Letters to the Editor

We’d be delighted to hear what you have to say about the articles we run in Industrial Marketer. Please send your comments to editor@industrialmarketer.com. We can’t guarantee we’ll be able to respond to all letters, but please be assured that all emails will be read and that we value your perspective.

Contributing to Industrial Marketer

If you’re interested in writing for Industrial Marketer or simply have ideas for articles, please contact editor@industrialmarketer.com. We’re always looking for strong voices and good subject matter.

Feedback on the Website

If you have a problem, suggestion, or even praise regarding the website, please send us an email at webmaster@industrialmarketer.com. Telling us what you think will help us improve everyone’s experience of Industrial Marketer.

Mailing Address

Industrial Marketer
c/o INDUSTRIAL
1401 5th Ave., North
Nashville, TN 37208

Online Advertising Inquiries

If you would like to advertise with Industrial Marketer, please contact advertising@industrialmarketer.com to receive a copy of our rate card.

Licensing

If you are interested in licensing content published in Industrial Marketer for republication, please contact rights@industrialmarketer.com.
